meanings.definition: The act of giving something to someone for a period of time, expecting it to be returned.
meanings.sent1: She made lendings of her favorite books to her friends.
meanings.sent2: The library keeps track of all the lendings of its books.
meanings.sent3: His lendings of toys to his little sister always resulted in a messy room.
meanings.sent4: The lendings of trust between them were fragile but essential.
meanings.sent5: The lendings of kindness in the community made everyone feel supported.

meanings.definition: The amount of money that has been lent.
meanings.sent1: The bank carefully recorded all the lendings to businesses in the ledger.
meanings.sent2: His lendings to friends were always repaid promptly.
meanings.sent3: The lendings for the new project exceeded all expectations.
meanings.sent4: The lendings of financial support helped the company grow rapidly.
meanings.sent5: Her lendings of money to those in need showed her generous spirit.
